subject: Cybersecurity
title: Colonial Pipeline: Ransomware Meets Reality
description: A fast breakdown of Colonial Pipeline: Ransomware Meets Reality for builders.

hook.text: One stolen password shut down the largest fuel pipeline in the U.S., causing panic buying across the East Coast.

buildup.text: In 2021, DarkSide ransomware locked Colonial Pipeline's billing systems. The company shut the pipeline as a precaution.

discovery.text: The attackers got in through a single compromised VPN password with no multi-factor authentication.

twist.text: Colonial paid $4.4 million in Bitcoin. The FBI later recovered $2.3 million by tracing the crypto wallet.

climax.text: A billing system hack shut down physical fuel delivery â€” showing how interconnected digital and physical systems are.

punchline.text: One password caused a fuel crisis for 50 million people.

quiz.question: How did attackers initially access Colonial Pipeline's systems?
options: A compromised VPN password without multi-factor authentication
